No Self-vindication.--My heart feels very sad that Brethren J and K have taken the position which they have. . . . You may inquire, "What effect does this have 
                                                                           75
upon you?" Sorrow only, sorrow of soul, but peace and perfect rest and trust in Jesus. To vindicate myself, my position, or my mission, I would not utter ten words. I would not seek to give evidence of my work. "By their fruits ye shall know them" (Matthew 7:20).--Letter 14, 1897.
